article_title: Saturday Night Apartment Fire In Sioux Falls
article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

Sioux Falls fire crews were able to extinguish a fire that broke out in a Sioux Falls apartment complex in 15 minutes Saturday night.

Crews arrived at 201 West 8th Street around 9:30 p.m Saturday to find smoke and flames in the apartment's stairwell. Most residents were able to get out themselves, but firefighters did have to help one person out. No one was injured.

The apartment where the fire started has smoke and flame damage, but the other apartments were undamaged. Residents were able to go back to their apartments the same night.

The cause of the fire is still under investigation.
